title: Identify the Core Element
text: Insight isn't only about facts, but about their implications and relevance to the problem at hand.

title: Beyond the Numbers
text: It's not always about finding the most complex statistical outcome, but about understanding the story behind the data.

title: Purposeful Inquiry
text: Consider that the right question can lead to discovering deeper insights or inconsistencies within the dataset.

title: Importance of Curiosity
text: Instead of settling for initial results, delve deeper into why those results matter in the larger context.

hintAnswer: Knowing what questions to ask of the data
title: Identify the Correct Insight Discovery Approach
text: Understanding the kind of questions that can transform data into meaningful insights is critical. It goes beyond basic analysis techniques.
choices: Not accepting the first insight you find while doing analysis
Looking for the most interesting or surprising finding
Knowing what questions to ask of the data
